paragraphs: Herein lies the knowledge of the Great Houses of the High Velothi culture. Light the Braziers of Knowledge and Wisdom before admittance can be gained. In darkness, the Wards of Andule yield to no mer.
Trust in the Prophet Veloth. Follow the path of tiles from Summerset to Exodus to Morrowind, and like the Velothi, you will find what you seek.
